original_text: He came as a witness, to bear witness about the light, that all might believe through him.
korean_text: 그가 증언하러 왔으니 곧 빛에 대하여 증언하고 모든 사람이 자기로 말미암아 믿게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: to bear witness about the light
that all might believe through him
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람이 그를 통해 믿게 하려 함입니다
